title: Game Scoop! 691: A Stellar Week for Game Annnouncements
description:
Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis,  and Colin Stevens -- are discussing The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, Octopath Traveler 2, Fire Emblem Engage, God of War Ragnarok, Stellar Blade, Rise of the Ronin, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.

 

00:00:00 - Intro/The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom/Nintendo Direct

00:27:20 - PlayStation State of Play/God of War Ragnarok/Stellar Blade

00:39:47 - What to play first on your PS5

00:45:51 - Extracurricular Activities: Light & Magic

00:49:23 - Random observations on a couple old arcade games

00:51:27 - Video Game 20 Questions
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis, Colin Stevens)
